pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, March 17, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation, and a media availability will follow.

Rideau Cottage
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 11:00 a.m. and to make their way to the P1 Gate once on the grounds.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists who are not members of the Parliamentary Press Gallery should contact Pierre Cuguen at pierre.cuguen@parl.gc.ca to obtain temporary accreditation.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:

Local: 613-960-7518
Toll-free: 1-866-805-7923
Pass code: 9218803#

Media appearances

8:18 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Radio-Canada’s Première heure avec Claude Bernatchez.

9:00 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on 680 News and other Rogers stations across the country throughout the day.
